subject: RE: [junit] How to add my output to junitreport?
msgSnippet: You can modify the style sheet, if your messages are not very specific to the test. Otherwise write your own implementation of JUnitResultFormatter. [smangal]
messageBody:
You can modify the style sheet, if your messages are not very specific to the test. Otherwise write your own implementation of JUnitResultFormatter.
 
[smangal]
-----Original Message-----
From: rabbitxu60 [mailto:rabbitxu60@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 11, 2002 8:54 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] How to add my output to junitreport?

Hello:
  I want to add my output messages to result of test in junitreport.
For example ,I use System.out.println() to print output to screen now,
but I want to add these message to html page in junitreport too. 

How to do?
Thank you very much.
